profile:
Invincible Garage specializes in designing your garage to look luxurious and well organized. We design cabinetry to meet your needs,  making everything easily accessible and manageable. Creating lighting that meets every family members needs,
whether its the handy man at work or kids simply practicing with their band in the garage, we have what best suits you. Painting skills that will add a fresh new look to your garage and applying floor coating that gives your garage a look that makes friends and neighbours think you spent millions. By making all these upgrades to your garage, you are adding more market value to your home and creating a space that you will enjoy every time you step into your car .

profile:
At Garage Tailors we challenge the status quo in the home organization space, so that we can do our part to help make our clients day a little less stressful.  Our operating principles are trust, honesty, transparency and value.  The experience for our clients must be positive and one that they have to tell their friends about. 
Our philosophy is that every families garage transformation, whether it's solely a floor coating to a full renovation, be designed and constructed to be within an agreed upon budget and schedule, that is how we work with you. From the initial estimate to when we say thank you for your business, we believe that we can meet all your expectations.
We service the GTA and all the surrounding areas.

WE SPECIALIZE IN ORGANIZING YOUR:
Garage, no matter how large or small, Any storage space in your home, Office or Workshop.

Services Include:

Garage Floor coatings and tiles
Organizing Solutions
Cabinetry (we carry several manufacturers)

We guarantee the quality of all our products and workmanship that includes professional installation for all services we perform.

"DO IT RIGHT THE 1ST TIME"

Other Services :

Junk removal
Organization Services

Insulation and Vapour Barrier
Complete Garage Renovations

     Reclaim your space with a garage organization system from 1st Choice Garage Outfitters. Imagine the possibilities of a clean, spacious organized garage. You will never be afraid or embarrassed to open your garage doors again!

     Our organization systems are composed of four components:

Walls
Floors
Ceilings
Accessory packages.
Each component can be purchased separately, however; we recommend the purchase of all four components for a complete makeover.

Do other areas in your home suffer from junk and clutter? We have the solution, our organization systems work great in closets, pantries, home offices, laundry rooms, and basements too!

     Theme your Garage. Add your own personal touch by creating color schemes and themes for your favorite sports team, sports car or motorcycle, golf, hunting, or fishing hobby. We offer custom trim packages and center floor logos to make your dream theme garage become a reality. 1st Choice Garage Outfitters offers its unique custom graphic series cabinets with your own logo or picture on the front face of the cabinets. The Graphic series is the ultimate freedom of expression. Choose from either our selection of hot designs or have us create your own, even using your own photographs or digital files. Making your garage your own personal custom look. Thanks to our patented, state-of-the-art imaging system, the graphics are embedded directly into the substrate, Engineered for the harsh garage environment, the graphics are very resistant to scratches and chemicals, and they will not peel or tear since they are not decals or stickers! 

Wall Systems 
     Our wall systems are composed of heavy gauge cellular vinyl slat wall engineered to support heavy duty accessories. The wall systems are available in several color choices: white, taupe, grey, antique white, and black.  It is now available in 3 wood grain finishes cherry, oak and maple grain.

The wall systems are backed by a best warranty in the industry and are manufactured in the United States.

Slatwall Accessory Packages 
     Maximize storage area with complete flexibility with an accessory package that fits your needs. 1st Choice Garage Outfitters offers six unique packages: Basic accessory kit, Intermediate accessory kit, Deluxe accessory kit, Golf accessory kit. Workshop accessory kit, sports accessory kit. Need more than what the package provides, no problem, we also offer a variety of items that can be purchased separately.

PVC Slatwall
     1st Choice Garage Outfitters offers PVC Slatwall quite simply because it is the highest quality and most durable garage wall organization and storage solution available. Compared with traditional MDF slatwall or pegboard, PVC Slatwall provides superior durability, flexibility and, important for many people, premium aesthetics.
     PVC Slatwall weighs a fraction of traditional MDF options, minimizing the stress on your walls. Yet has superior weight capacity, maximizing the holding power onto your walls. And, PVC slatwall does not degrade over time.
For non-drywalled garage interiors, PVC slatwall is a viable alternative. The slatwall can be applied on top of drywall or attach directly to studs, replacing the need for drywall if you choose. It is also easily attached directly to concrete walls in areas such as a storage or cold room, creating even more storage capacity in your home.
Cleaning is easy too. Simply hose the wall down or wipe it with a traditional mop broom for a like new finish.
Learn more about our PVC Slatwall at the bottom of this page.

PVC Slatwall
     Trim for a clean, professional and finished look
Available in 5 popular colours: white, taupe, gray, maple wood grain and black.
Slatwall is installed with colour-coordinated installation screws and trim for a consistent, seamless and finished look.
1st Choice Garage Outfitters' PVC Slatwall is the chassis for a single wall or your total garage solution. It provides the ultimate in flexibility for your ever-changing organization and storage needs. Few things are permanently affixed to the Slatwall. Once Slatwall is installed, accessories such as cabinetry, shelving, baskets, hooks, and sports or gardening fixtures can be easily relocated or added in just minutes. It really is that simple.
